name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Robert FISHER, Appellant

judges: Before: CASTILLE, C.J. and SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD, McCAFFERY and ORIE MELVIN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Robert FISHER, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of February, 2011, the order of the Court of Common Pleas is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Stuart Brian Lev, Defender Association of Philadelphia, for Robert Fisher, appellant.
Robert Martin Falin, Montgomery County District Attorney’s Office, Amy Zapp, PA Office of Attorney General, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
12 A.3d 748
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Robert FISHER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 22, 2011.
Stuart Brian Lev, Defender Association of Philadelphia, for Robert Fisher, appellant.
Robert Martin Falin, Montgomery County District Attorney’s Office, Amy Zapp, PA Office of Attorney General, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, appellee.
Before: CASTILLE, C.J. and SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD, McCAFFERY and ORIE MELVIN, JJ.
